theorem.name: val_inductive_clause

text.english:
Inductive clause of the definition of \(\texttt{val}\):

\[ \forall n \in \mathcal{N}Term .\; \texttt{val}(S(n)) = \texttt{val}(n) + 1  \]
text.italiano:
Clausola induttiva della definizione di \(\texttt{val}\):

\[ \forall n \in \mathcal{N}Term .\; \texttt{val}(S(n)) = \texttt{val}(n) + 1  \]

theorem.coq:
Theorem val_inductive_clause : forall (n : nterm) , val (S n) = val n + 1.
Proof.
reflexivity.
Qed.
